attributes.action: work to remove the People's Mujahedin of Iran from the EU's terrorism blacklist.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The European Court of Justice ruled at the end of 2006 that the PMOI shouldn't be blacklisted any longer, but the Council of the EU chose to ignore that ruling. That decision has left the apparently widespread grass-roots resistance in Iran to operate in complete isolation, while the current regime effectively has the political support of both the EU and the USA when it comes to internal matters. The USA at present show every sign of wanting to make war on that regime, which presumably we in the UK would be forced to support (again). I think I see a way out of this...
